title: Exempts occupational disease caused by tobacco smoke from 2 year filing limit
summary: Exempts occupational disease caused by occupational exposure to tobacco smoke from 2 year filing limit for workers' compensation provided such claims were filed within two years of disablement and after the claimant knew or should have known that the disease was due to the nature of employment.
